import React from "react"; import Newsletter from "./Newsletter"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; import click from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/tap.png"; import maint from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/maintainance.png"; import energy from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/solar-energy.png"; import eng from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/idea.png"; // import img1 from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/Rectangle 55.png" // import img2 from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/Rectangle 57.png" // import img3 from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/Rectangle 60.png" import video from "/Users/duaashahid/Desktop/olive/src/pictures-olive/video (2160p).mp4"; const logos = [ click, maint, energy, eng, // Add more logo images here ]; const textBelowImages = [ "Operation and Commisioning", "Maintainence Inspection and Machining", "Engineering", "Wind Power and Renewable", // Add more descriptions here ]; function PlantServices() { const settings = { infinite: true, speed: 4000, slidesToShow: logos.length - 1, slidesToScroll: 1, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 0, centerMode: true, centerPadding: "0", swipeToSlide: false, }; const divStyle = { position: "relative", // Make the div relative // Add other CSS styles as needed zindex: -1, }; return (

Plant Maintainence Services

Operating three plants round the year with minimum outage, we have 40 years of experience in turnaround planning & execution including maintenance and inspection.

Key Offerings

{logos.map((logo, index) => (

{textBelowImages[index]}

))}

Technical Services

Operation and Commisioning

Increase the efficiency and effectiveness of your organization’s HR processes such as personnel administration, org management, benefits administration, time management and payroll etc.

Wind Power and Renewable

MM module facilitates the procurement process and handles approvals starting from requisition till goods receipt. Provides inventory management, valuation of material, goods movement and material requirement planning.

Maintainence Inspection and Machining

Effective management of sales’ documents in a unified system. Facilitates your sales team from orders all the way to billing.

Engineering

Effective management of sales’ documents in a unified system. Facilitates your sales team from orders all the way to billing.

); } export default PlantServices;
